document.docAuthor: Abdinbekova, Arifa, Huseynova, Ellada & Kerimova, Ilhama
document.docOrigin: Beiträge Zur Entomologie = Contributions to Entomology 67 (2)
document.masterDocTitle: Braconidae (Hymenoptera) in the collection of the Institute of Zoology, NAS of Azerbaijan Republic Part V. Subfamilies Chardichilinae, Microgasterinae and Miracinae

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Braconidae (Hymenoptera) in the collection of the Institute of Zoology, NAS of Azerbaijan Republic Part V. Subfamilies Chardichilinae, Microgasterinae and Miracinae
Beiträge Zur Entomologie = Contributions to Entomology

subSubSection.paragraph:

( Pteromalidae ),
Eurytoma strigifrons THOM.
( Eurytomidae ) ( TOBIAS et al. 1986 , ABDINBEKOVA 1995 , YU et al. 2012 ).

Distribution : Europe, Latvia , Lithuania , Moldova , Russia , Ukraine , Turkey , Iran , Kazakhstan , Uzbekistan , Tajikistan , Afghanistan , China , Korea , Japan , South Caucasus, Azerbaijan ( YU et al., 2012 , TOBIAS et al. 1986 , ABDINBEKOVA 1975 ).
